name: swelteringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If the weather or a place is swelteringly hot, it is extremely and uncomfortably hot. : it is swelteringly hot She was wearing a long skirt and boots, even though it was swelteringly hot outside.swelteringly hot The tiny theatre was swelteringly hot and Mike was sweating profusely.
More examplesFewer examplesThe town was a three-hour drive across an unbroken plain on a swelteringly hot morning.It was swelteringly hot, and Constance could feel her dress sticking to her back as she walked.This blind is the perfect way to keep your office cool on swelteringly hot summer days.It was a swelteringly humid early afternoon.
